abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie Unsullied, directed by Simeon Rice.
lead_paragraph: Directed by the former N.F.L. defensive end Simeon Rice, this lurid low-budget thriller recalls 1970s exploitation revenge pictures.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Unsullied,’ a Competitive Racer Must Run for Her Life
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Unsullied,’ a Competitive Racer Must Run for Her Life

snippet: Directed by the former N.F.L. defensive end Simeon Rice, this lurid low-budget thriller recalls 1970s exploitation revenge pictures.
